It's shit when you fully play for free so I recommend buying Prime Factor when you want to come to as many legit players as possible. Otherwise it's a pretty fun game when you train the skill for it.

Buen shooter FPS. Realmente Cs:Go se me hace un juego del estilo "todos deben tenerlo" aunque no seas dedicado a el. Yo en lo personal lo juego muy poco y solo lo abro cuando algún amigo casualmente tiene ganas de jugar. Es un buen juego competitivo con un buen sistema de clasificatorias.

For me, this is the best shooter. The only thing I don’t like is the selection of ranks, it fluctuates very much and sometimes you can’t even do anything.

o jogo em si é muito bom, tem diferentes modos dentro do jogo, tem uma jogabilidade incrível e um gráfico ótimo. Porem o jogo conta com pessoas muito toxicas e isso não permite que um novo jogador tenha uma experiencia legal.

7 years old and still holds up and competes with many of the newest games while games that are the same age old or younger like tf2 are slowly dieing. This game is the only game that you can say that as it got older it got better.

They've completely given up on the task of making this game hack free. Thus, playing online competitively becomes an exhausting effort of trying to find fun matches without facing game breaking hackers. Would be a lot better if they invested in upgrading the game's anti-hack mechanisms instead of adding more useless money grab cosmetics.
